mapper.insert: INSERT INTO storage (scode, sspot, sname, spost, saddress1, saddress2, smname, smhp, suse, mid, sdeleted, sdate) VALUES (#{scode}, #{sspot}, #{sname}, #{spost}, #{saddress1}, #{saddress2}, #{smname}, #{smhp}, #{suse}, #{mid}, #{sdeleted}, NOW())
mapper.select: select * from storage where sname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
mapper.update: update storage set sname = #{sname}, spost = #{spost}, saddress1 = #{saddress1}, saddress2 = #{saddress2}, smname = #{smname}, smhp = #{smhp}, suse = #{suse} where scode = #{scode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (acompany, acode, pdcode, pdname, pdamount, sname, scode, pname, pddate) VALUES (#{acompany}, #{acode}, #{pdcode}, #{pdname}, #{pdamount}, #{sname}, #{scode}, #{pname}, #{pddate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pdamount = pdamount + VALUES(pdamount), pddate = VALUES(pddate);
